name: clockify
description: A time tracker to make sure that you really spent the time you think you spent working, studying, etc.
author: anasouardini

scripts.ci: npm run formatCheck && npm run lint && npm run testOnce && npm run build
scripts.release: npm run ci && npx changeset && git add . && git commit -m 'release: creating a release' && npx changeset publish && git push origin main && git push origin --tags
